name: PHASM0PH0BIA
description:
Experience a truly terrifying psychological ghost hunting horror experience, which will have you possessed terrified trembling!
Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you to use all the ghost hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.
Search for and record evidence to be used for ghost removals.
Realistic graphics and environment sounds. Immersive experience that will keep you on your toes.
Use ghost hunting equipment such as EMF Readers, Spirit Boxes, Thermometers and Night Vision Cameras to find clues and gather as much paranormal evidence as you can.
